field.name: Give oral anti-malaria treatment: oral Artesunate Amodiaquine or Arthemeter /Lumefantrine
Give Mebendazole or Albendazole [if child is aged 2 years or above & has not had a dose in the previous 6 months]
Give 500 mg mebendazole or 400mg albendazole as a single dose in clinic if the child has not had a dose in the previous 6 months
NB: preferably, give mebendazole 100mg twice daily for 3 days, instead of 500mg as a single dose
Advise mother on when to return for care immediately per table below:
Counsel the mother according to the feeding recommendations
Counsel mother on feeding a sick child
Advise caregiver /mother to return for follow up care in 14 days
